workDone: Implemented robust AWS S3 security protocols, utilizing access controls, server-side encryption, and versioning to protect sensitive cloud data.

Successfully completed all project modules to earn the XPMC (XPro) Cybersecurity certification.
learnings: Gained practical expertise in cloud security posture management, specifically mastering data protection strategies on S3 and identity management via AWS IAM.

learnings: Mastered the convergence of Generative AI and Blockchain to create ed-tech solutions, focusing on agentic workflows and real-time data handling.
